errors.cannot_Authorize:
*I cannot authorize you on Spotify.* 

Maybe you have blocked the bot in your *Spotify* account, use the /logout command and log in again.
errors.servers_Link_Error:
Unable to connect to *Spotify* servers. 

Perhaps this is *Spotify* server error, and you need to wait.
errors.unknown_Error: *Unknown error.* If the error persists, contact the developer via the */contacts* command
errors.denied_Work_Reason: At the moment, you can not use this function, please wait.
errors.insufficient_Data_For_Top:
*Not enough data to display the tops.* 

Listen to the songs more often, and someday the data will appear.
errors.now_Playing_Error: *This song does not contain all the metadata*, so the information cannot be displayed.

notifications.nowplaying_Nothing: At the moment, nothing is playing.
notifications.playlist_Preparing: *Your playlist is being prepared, please wait.* It might take a couple of minutes.
notifications.astray_Notification: If you suddenly get astray, you can use the */menu* command to return to the main menu.
notifications.function_On_Way: This feature will be available soon, stay tuned.

yourTops.yourTops_Description:
In this section, you can find your *Top Artists*, and your *Top Songs* for a certain period of time. 

For the *Top Songs*, I can suggest you create a playlist from these songs.
yourTops.top_Songs_Header: Here's your top songs (Displayed only 10 songs out of 50):
yourTops.top_Songs_Footer: Do I need to create a playlist? (The playlist will contain 50 songs)
yourTops.top_Artists_Header: Here's your top artists (Displayed only 10 artists out of 50):

superShuffle.insufficient_Data_For_Shuffle:
*You don't have enough songs for Super Shuffle.* 

Add more songs and this feature will be available (minimum 100 songs)
superShuffle.superShuffle_Description:
The *Super Shuffle* takes all the songs from your *Liked Songs* section and just shuffles them so many times and then creates a new playlist where it puts those songs. 

*The minimum number of songs in the Liked Songs section should be 100.*

youTube.searching_Clip: *Your clip is being searched*, please wait.

musicQuiz.musicQuiz_Preparing: *Your game session is being prepared*, please wait.
musicQuiz.musicQuiz_Answer_Timeout:
üî¥ <b>Unfortunately, the time to answer the question has run out!<b> 

This is: <b>{right_Answer}<b> 

Answer Time: <b>{took_Time_Answer}s<b>
musicQuiz.musicQuiz_End:
*The quiz is over!* 

Your Result Is *{correct_Answers} / {total_Rounds}*
musicQuiz.musicQuiz_Error_NoTracks:
Due to the peculiarities of *Spotify*, could not create a game session.

 *Please try again*.
musicQuiz.musicQuiz_Error_RoundProcess:
*Sorry*, Music Quiz has encountered an internal error.

 *Try to start a new game*.
musicQuiz.musicQuiz_Question: Listen the song, and select an answer ü§î
musicQuiz.insufficient_Data_For_MusicQuiz:
*You don't have enough songs for Music Quiz.* 

Listen to more songs, and someday you can play a Music Quiz.
musicQuiz.musicQuiz_Rules:
The *Music Quiz* consists of 10 songs from your music library. 

*Rules of the game:* 
1. You are given a 30 second segment of a song. 
2. You are given 10 seconds to answer, if you did not answer in time - the answer will be considered incorrect. 
3. You are given four choices, one of which is correct. 
4. Don't cheat! ü§î 

You can exit the game by entering the command */menu*

authorization.spotify_Login_Offer:
Hi, i'm *Jarvis*, Your personal Spotify music bot. 

It seems you are not signed in to your *Spotify* account. Please log in to your account. 

*You can disconnect your account at any time using the /logout command.*
authorization.user_Leaving:
I'm sorry that you are leaving. üò≠ 
If you have any problems, you can contact us via the /contacts command. 

*To completely disable the Jarvis, go to the Spotify website.*
authorization.auth_Complete:
Welcome aboard, *{user_Nickname}!* 

Your *Spotify* account is successfully connected! 

*Some useful commands:* 
*/menu* - Return to main menu 
*/logout* - Disable bot for your account 
*/contacts* - Contacts for communication with the developer 

Enjoy the bot. 
If you have any questions, you can contact the developer.
authorization.developer_Contacts:
Are you having problems? Questions? You found a bug? 

There are 2 ways to contact the developer. *Discord* and *VKontakte*.
